_header: More than body heart good and service
_description: The Service of his Mistress by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy (abab)

BLHar682.First Lines:
More then body hert good and serviseAs haue y ellis to yeue yow
                    fayre princes…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…As takith not the lesse regard of my payneBut graunt my yeft
                    and hit suffisith me
BLHar682.Note: Scribe miswrote second word in line 2, should be “naue.”
